Description:
The King is back! Get ready to be reincarnated as the coolest, turretless and desperate hero in the history of video games. Since his last adventure has been almost ten years, but the players all over the world for a moment not lost hope of meeting with him. And their dream became a reality - a world flooded with hordes of alien invaders, so - Duke Nukem is back! No foul Svinokopy nor evil space aliens or giant monsters - nothing and no one valiant knock muscular blond out of the way and not detract from his hobbies - calmly to save the world and protect the beauties! For the punishment of apostates at the legendary robust fellow stashed an impressive arsenal of firearms toys. Adrenaline going wild and unprecedented interactivity - are your prospects in a company inimitable Duke! Supplement "The Doctor Who Cloned Me" throw Duke into the depths of Area 51, where Dr. Proton devised a new evil plan. Duke battles are coming with new enemies: the evil clones, alien queens and everyone else who dares to stand in his way. Of course, the new campaign will include new weapons and enemies. Forward! The fate of this world (yet again!) Depends only on you!
